thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Friday, 12 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Telit Communications Says Italian Tax Authorities Submitted Appeals To Supreme Court

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Telit Communications Says Italian Tax Authorities Submitted Appeals To Supreme Court

organizations.name: brief-telit communications says italian tax authorities submitted appeals to supreme court

text:
Jan 12 (Reuters) - Telit Communications Plc:
* TELIT COMMUNICATIONS PLC - ITALIAN TAX AUTHORITIES HAVE SUBMITTED APPEALS TO ITALIAN SUPREME COURT WITH REGARD TO PAST DECISIONS BY LOWER LEVEL COURTS
* TELIT COMMUNICATIONS PLC - TELIT ITALY INTENDS TO CONTINUE TO VIGOROUSLY DEFEND ITS POSITION
* TELIT COMMUNICATIONS PLC - TELIT ITALY HAS BEEN ADVISED THAT IT IS LIKELY THAT MATTERS WILL NOT BE HEARD BY SUPREME COURT BEFORE 2022 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
